import React,{useState} from 'react' import './OCMain.css' export default function OCMain(props){ const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("winner"); console.log(props.data); return(
  • setActiveTab("winner")}>Recent Winners
  • setActiveTab("newGiveaways")}>New Giveaways
  • setActiveTab("endingGiveaways")}>Ending Giveaways
{props.data.filter((item) => item.category === activeTab).map((tabbedContent) => {console.log(tabbedContent); return(

{tabbedContent.title}

{tabbedContent.description}

)})}
) }
